content: a useful everyday little pouch to store small objects in your handbag pens and stationery for your studies or your current crochet projects the raised zig-zag motif gives it a modern look and you can play with your favorite colors reflection is a sturdy pouch that mainly uses single_crochet stitches worked in back loop only and triple crochet stitches to create the chevron motif all around the pouch it s worked in the round and the zipper is hand-sewn at the end lining the bag is not required because the stitches used are dense so nothing can poke through
